title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.6 - Approval or disapproval of proposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.6 - Approval or disapproval of proposal

State Regulations
(a) A proposal, when accepted by the
executive director as provided in section
5903.4
(d) of this

Part, shall be reviewed and evaluated by the research and review committee, which shall recommend whether or not a grant award shall be made. The
recommendation shall be forwarded by the executive director to the board of
directors. (b) The board of
directors shall have the full power and authority to determine whether to
approve or disapprove the proposal. (c) The executive director shall notify the
applicant of the foundation's decision on the proposal as soon as possible
after a decision is reached by the board of directors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5903.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
